name: Arty and the Amazon
description:
Arty and the Amazon is a 2D side scrolling adventure platformer. Arty, a baby Orangutan, is trying to escape the horrid wild fire that is spreading rapidly through his home. Players help guide Arty to safety in this heart-wrenching game that will make you love and appreciate the animals in our world.

 

 

All artwork and background music are original. Sound effects are from freesounds.org, Mechanics code written by Michael Baker- University of Texas at Austin.
